column2: Galadriel presented each of them with gifts. To Legolas she gave a bow such as the Galadhrim used. The bow was longer and stouter than the bows of Mirkwood
column3: and it was strung with a string of elf-hair. With it went a quiver of arrows. The bow proved to be a very useful gift indeed
column4: for it was with this bow that Legolas shot down the descending Fell beasts from the sky
